title: Support managing all named components in solrconfig
description:
The general convention is that the command will have a prefix create, update, delete and a hyphen and the name of the component (case insensitive)
The named components are

	requestHandler
	queryParser
	queryResponseWriter
	valueSourceParser
	transformer
	queryConverter
